definitions.definition: Someone who observes or beholds ; an observer or spectator .
A fictional monster in roleplaying games , a floating orb of flesh with a large mouth and many eyes on stalks .

main_definition: Someone who observes or beholds ; an observer or spectator .
secondary_definitions: ( fantasy ) A fictional monster in roleplaying games , a floating orb of flesh with a large mouth and many eyes on stalks .
